title: Almond Macaroons.
ingredients: ¾ 2 White oz. Ib. confectioners’ almond 1 small paste. egg. sugar. Almonds finely chopped. blanched and
soft, in a long roll. Cut pieces from roll three-fourths
inch long. Roll each separately in chopped nuts, at the
same time shaping form a crescent. Bake
